works.description: The content boxes (in the centre of the page) underneath the products on the main page of selloffaccessories.com, are directly copied from a product comparison page on NDS-Gear.com. Please see the boxes starting with the title "R4 DS", "R4 DS SDHC", and "Acekard 2i" in particular. A lot of the content is directly lifted and shows up in Copyscale.
